website_summaries.verdict: The Fujifilm FinePix HS50EXR's features and performance are well beyond those of your average point-and-shoot megazoom, making it a fine choice for enthusiasts and as a family camera.
pros: The Fujifilm FinePix HS50EXR has a nice 42x manual zoom lens
very good picture quality for its class
a lot of shooting options, including manual and semimanual modes and raw capture
cons: Its manual zoom isn't great for zooming while capturing movies
for those uninitiated with Fujifilm's EXR sensors, getting the best results can require a little extra effort

website_summaries.verdict: The Fujifilm FinePix HS50EXR is a big camera with an impressive 42x zoom lens and plenty of controls, but its images don't hold up in low light.
cons: Images suffer at higher ISO settings

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and feature-packed
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility and convenience of a bridge camera, so when it was time to upgrade from my trusty HS20EXR, I opted for the discontinued HS50EXR instead of something newer. It is loaded with so many features, it takes awhile to get familiar with them. I hope nothing happens to this camera because I don't want a DSLR or even a newer mirrorless bridge camera. There are a few specialized shots, such as super macro, that this camera can't do, but it does well enough to have earned me several Explores on Flickr, so it is plenty good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: My choice for your 1st or 5th bridge camera.
customer_reviews.text: My first bridge camera and it looks like I made a great choice! It's easy to learn and easy to use. Much experimenting will be done in the future and I can't imagine I'll find many situations where I would be sorry I didn't buy a different camera. I bought it for action pictures of dogs we get in our rescue organization and it fits the need very well. I originally was leaning toward the Nikon P-530 but when I compared it to the HS50EXR I chose it instead. It's a mite larger and a bit heavier but I view that as a plus. I think I made a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: What Are You Waiting For? THIS Is Your Next Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I begin... So we have a couple of point and shoot cameras: Samsung and Panasonic. They work well but forget about "superb PQ for fast moving photos". I researched TONS of cameras including DSLR's and from all of the reviews I have read, this "bridge camera" was right there at the very top! It feels "quality" in your hands. It is effortless to take pics with and easy to learn and navigate through. What abut that Picture Quality you ask...? Absolutely FANTASTIC in every situation I've used it in: bright sunlight, macro, fast objects, and low light. This folks is a WINNER!!! And the price is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: "BIG MARCUS"

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about a year and I still love this camera. The only reason I drop it one star is due to the small sensor, it has some noise in indoor shots. I've been a fan of mega zooms for years and this camera with its manual zoom is amazingly fast. 2 year update (almost). I've bumped it up to 5 stars from 4. I've shot thousands of pictures with this camera and love it. Shooting in Sports mode has eliminated my blur issues while trying to keep up with my 3 year old and my 2 dogs. Party mode works great for shooting indoor shots. Love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb camera
customer_reviews.text: This Fujifilm camera is great, especially with a manual zoom function. It is the closest to a dslr and the photos are good if not better than my Nikon dslr. The EXR function is novel and really helps with resolution. It has a variety of effects and is quite intuitive to use. Amazing zoom capabilities. Really happy with this purchase, and would recommend this to everybody who wants to take great photos with relative ease. Macro and portrait are excellent too. So is the rapid shooting mode. Recently succeeded in taking amazing photos of the supermoon, something I couldn't get right before the EXR and zoom feature of this Bridge camera. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: nancydyson

customer_reviews.title: My choice : the Fuji HS50-EXR
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all the popular "mega-zooms" on the market and sent them all back, except one : the Fuji HS50-EXR. This Fuji performs much better than any other point n' shoot camera I have tried and would be my recommendation to anyone looking for a long zoom / point and shoot. Lots of practical useful features, and the manual zoom is much quicker than a clunky motorized zoom. Color reproduction is excellent especially in EXR modes. Lightning fast start up and focus. Even the digital zoom functions well. The alligator pic below was taken at 42x full extended manual zoom plus digital zoom. Al the photos were taken from a far distance.
customer_reviews.author: Halford

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but easy to use camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible camera with so many features. While I like to play around with taking pictures, I also value a high quality "point and shoot" capability which this camera delivers beautifully. Got this camera for upcoming dream vacation, it will certainly be the perfect way to document my adventures. I like that it provides a very incredibly zoom range in one package. No extra lenses or bags necessary. Hang this baby around your neck for the hikes and tours, no need for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it after seeing the quality of photos a friend was getting with his. I was using a Canon DSLR but always seemed to have the wrong lens on and kept missing shots. Within 3 days of getting the Fuji I gave the Canon to my mom and I've used the Fuji exclusively since. The long telephoto has let me get some wildlife shots that I never would have been able to before because I couldn't afford the comparable lenses for my Canon. And I can just as easily do excellent macro shots without ever having to change lenses. Can't say enough good about this camera!
customer_reviews.author: MeadowlarkMT

customer_reviews.title: Love this Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love Fuji cameras and this one is no exception. I had it for 3 days and took over 2000 photos involving various lighting, motion, day and night shots, and used the manual and set focus'. Photo quality was very good and the camera is easy to use. Night action shots are blurred but I need to practice (to be fair). My last camera was a S1800 and I will be keeping that as my second. The camera is heavy but not unmanageable. I would suggest that you familiarize yourself with the manual first but options are easy to find
customer_reviews.author: cemeterysrock

customer_reviews.title: FAST! I am SO Happy with this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO Happy with this camera! I got it to replace the older version. I used for pictures of my son surfing so I needed a camera that can take pictures FAST and recover fast! The older version was so slow and I had to be lucky to get a good shot even though the zoom was good. This one is SO MUCH better! I can go fast shot to shot or continuous without losing my subject ( surfer ) on the wave so I can shoot more. Not great in low light, but I LOVE that it has a "eyeball viewfinder" which is a huge plus in bright light! Also the battery lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy From Maui

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Camera
customer_reviews.text: Photos are very sharp and clear. The zoom, even at 1000, produces very acceptable photos - I was expecting okay shots at 1000, but was amazed how good they actually were. I am still learning how and when to use the endless features of this camera, but took many fine photos even before reading the instructions. This is a camera to use immediately, simply and a camera to grow into. Have fun and create wonderful photos at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Snarley

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS CAMERA WHILE YOU CAN AS IT IS THE LAST HS FUJI CAMERA MADE AND IS A FANTASTIC PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th HS series camera from Fuji and is the best one of the bunch by far.I believe it is the last Fuji made in the HS series and I am so glad I bought this one.It works as advertised and I couldn't be happier with this purchase.Read how it works under the camera heading and you will see how great a camera that it is.I am already taking wonderful photos.
customer_reviews.author: snake keeper

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm Finepix HS50
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera in the height of the winter storms in New England, so I didn't get out as much as I wanted. When I finally did, however, this camera truly won me over. I don't shoot raw, but the .jpg files are clean, the EXR mode is amazing. It's a bit bigger than I had imagined, not having had the opportunity to handle it before ordering, but still worth the extra ounce or two. The zoom is crystal clear even at full length. As a fairly serious bridge camera, I would have a hard time finding something better (and I spent a lot of time comparing).
customer_reviews.author: Jill Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: A DSLR without the hassle of hauling lenses, .....
customer_reviews.text: One of Fuji's best. This Camera is a DSLR without the need to haul a bunch of extra lenses. I have been shooting since way before digital, and have had most all the big name SLR and DSLRs. Done a little professional work, and been published a couple times. That said, I think this camera is one of the best camera values out there. Capable of fantastic shots, and amazing Fuji quality. For the money, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: No longer takes usable pictures
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera based on previous positive experiences with Fuji cameras. Unfortunately after about 12 months of ownership the camera started taking poor pictures. Indoor pics with Flash on became distorted and poor color quality. Outdoor pics became unusable as the exposure turned the image white. I took the camera to a Camera & Photography shop. They reset it and as tested it but were unable to determine the issue, or a fix for it. They recommended I replace it as the cost to send it off for diagnostic and repair was likely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jelinek

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for Landscape & Wildlife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera after I returned the Fuji Finepix S1 which broke after 3 months & I returned it. I like this model better because of the manual zoom ring, which the S1 does not have. I use it mostly for landscape and wildlife photography. I have taken some real nice pictures. It is a bit large & heavy for long hikes but worth it. I chose this bridge camera because I do not want to carry extra lenses on long hikes. I recommend this camera for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Allman Head

customer_reviews.title: Fujififlm does not stand behind their product when known error crops up
customer_reviews.text: Originally, loved the camera. BUT...got a lens error on opening it. Research on the internet shows this is a common problem. Fujifilm sent a BILL for $168 - all labor, no parts - for a software fix on a camera only used about 6 times. Ridiculous! OK, so they promised to honor the warranty. Great. When will I hear from them next? It's been a month now since they said they would start work on it... I WANT to be happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: I personally think this is a great camera for beginner photographers like myself
customer_reviews.text: I personally think this is a great camera for beginner photographers like myself. I bought this camera hoping it would have great video quality, which it didn't. The video quality is decent but I would suggest something else. But I would like to say that it takes great pictures. WARNING! It does not come with an attachable lens! The lens does not come off so know what you're getting yourself into! I bought this camera hoping that it would have a detachable lens, but it didn't. But I would give it 4 starts because of the video quality, other than that, it's a great camera that I would suggest to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Reformed Grits

customer_reviews.title: ... (HS) series camera and I have yet to be disappointed. Not a DSLR
customer_reviews.text: My third Fuji (HS) series camera and I have yet to be disappointed. Not a DSLR, so it's not fair to compare. However this is a wonderful "Bridge Camera". I want Bridge cameras that do a good job, and makes great pictures rather than having to travel with all the extra camera gear needed with a DSLR. The Fuji has alway done an excellent job at filling the Bridge Camera role. I'm very pleased. Don't think you will do any better at this price range and convince range.
customer_reviews.author: Don't want to use a name

customer_reviews.title: Best in class bridge camera.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so here is an update. My camera came without the battery so I was little disappointed about that. But Amazon fixed the problem and my battery arrived today. I was so excited. The camera works as stated very very very good . As a newbie there is learning curve to this fine product, but other than that the pictures are razor sharp the focus is snappy with pin point accuracy. A good bridge camera for anyone wanting more than just a point a shoot. two thumbs up Fuji and well done Amazon for being a fine customer problem solver. D. O'Neil
customer_reviews.author: Desborne O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and unbelievable camera for its price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a 3 years of experience with the older version ( Finepix HS10 ) and it took me about a couple of months to make professional shots with it, but with the HS50EXR, it's unbelievable, from the first 2 days I was able to get a clear and clean shot for the moon, also tried some macro shots, the new EXR CMOS is excellent. I can't say anything else but to recommend this Camera to any one who wants to have a perfect camera for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Faiez Syala

customer_reviews.title: Good to excellent depending on how you shoot
customer_reviews.text: Well designed control layout, fast focus for this type of camera, and nice implementation of manual focus system with focus peaking. I also prefer the manual zoom control as I take far more photos than videos. Motorized zoom will work better for those who take more videos. Quality of EVF is very good for this class of camera. I subtract one star because image quality deteriorates noticeably at focal length greater than 700mm. If you don't use the longest end of the zoom much this camera could be perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: T. Trzcinski

customer_reviews.title: I thnk this will be a great camera for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a camera that didn't suffer from shutter lag so I could actually get the pictures of my Granddaughter before she moves. So far I have been very impressed w/the Fuji HS50exr. Probabaly has more settings than I will ever use, but the EXR setting seems to do a great job of figuring out what I am trying to get a picture of and gettin me the picture I want w/o alot of hassle. Looking forward to using it when we go to Europe next month.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Fuji HS50EXR Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I've been in the photo finishing industry for over 20 years and have been a Nicon F4-F5 SLR user. As a composite 16 mega pixel cmos camera this Fuji works great. All of the necessary digital control are good and provide great pictures. I purchased to use on my Panama Trip and took over 1700 pics. Zoom capability was unbelievable in providing images with great detail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with product!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the product, it exceeded my expectations since it was a used camera but when I recieved it, it said it was new. I have been having so much fun with this camera. Still learning all the features. The only thing was the package was damaged in the USPS. It did not affect the camera.
customer_reviews.author: NE customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Superzoom camera
customer_reviews.text: As this being my step up from my pocket camera, all I can say is that this camera is amazing. It does everything I need it to do. Take pictures of my kids at races, not a problem. Zoom into Mt. Baker from an adjecent peak and get a clear shot of a cravass, not a problem. A 360 shot, not a problem. This camera is more fun than my phone and is easy to port around. Add that with the two extra batteries and a four day trip in the backcountry adds up to hundreds of amazing pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Takes great videos and pictures
customer_reviews.text: This camera is AWESOME! My first use was to take a video of a reunion of friends. The quality of the images was very good, and the sound was true to life. I have been pleased with the quality of the still photo feature.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: The features are great, if feels great
customer_reviews.text: The features are great, if feels great, it functions well, but the image quality just isn't there. The JPEGs come out better than what Lightroom can do with the RAW files, both of them are pretty noisy. The RAW files are even noisier when converted to JPEG. This camera would have been amazing if they just improved on the sensor a bit.
customer_reviews.author: vulcan88

customer_reviews.title: Its a fully loaded camera...
customer_reviews.text: Fujifilm...I must say this is a true competitor for a DSLR and have Tons and loads of features which are not available in many high end camera... The best features consist of the Zoom huge 42x i.e.1024 mm. Electronic viewfinder which covers all most all the scree information and is in 92k resolution... Full manual control with manual focus... Burst mode... Cons... Its weight... And little bit the photo quality... It would be so great if there is 20 mp.
customer_reviews.author: Kanwer Manan

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are beautiful. I'm still learning all of the settings and tricks but so far am very pleased with the product. It feels sturdy in my hand and well made. The controls are in easily accessable places for my fingers so that I don't have to stop and look to see what I'm changing. All in all, I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Leonard

customer_reviews.title: This has everything the Cannons & Nikons have except a ...
customer_reviews.text: This has everything the Cannons & Nikons have except a larger chip to take pictures in darker areas. No lenses to buy or carry around. No heavy camera but a light weight 24 to 1000mm lense and all the special features for under $400
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Love the manual zoom. Packed with features. Takes excellent photos. I was going to by a DSLR, but glad I bought this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Carl W

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long for the price
customer_reviews.text: The LCD screen broke after about two years and it's been four years and now the main screen is messed up and the zoom making it almost useless. I think paying that price you should get more years out of it!
customer_reviews.author: NatnCurt

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures, but could be better indoors
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures outside, and ok pictures inside. I take a lot of pictures of my kids, and inside when they are running around the pictures are just blurry. That said, I have yet to find an affordable camera that can do that. Overall I love this camera, and use it all the time. It a great combination of manual and automatic.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: made a profesional photographer jealous
customer_reviews.text: I recently was shooting at a car show and a profesional was asking me about the camera to see the pics i had taken.. then asked me to send some video and pics so his company could use them in case his didnt turn out as good.. so far they have used every one i have sent them..
customer_reviews.author: Buy guy

customer_reviews.title: great camera. great pictures
customer_reviews.text: great camera. great pictures. As an amateur photographer it gives me both the options of automatic (for grandkids pix) or manual for more artsy stuff. Would definitely buy again.,
customer_reviews.author: Nannykat

customer_reviews.title: very fun camera
customer_reviews.text: This a a fantastic camera for photoing butterflies and quick moving wildlife. Also not bad for video and landscapes. The photos seem great but haven't printed any as of yet. Yes it has a small sensor but gee this camera does a lot! Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Richard T.

customer_reviews.title: This is great cam. It is super fast and if you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great cam. It is super fast and if you take the time to learn how to use it it takes great pics. If you need a bridge super zoom camera buy this one fast before there all gone.
customer_reviews.author: dmerlin

customer_reviews.title: Shutterbug
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This camera is awesome! All my photos are great! I've gotten so much business since switching to this camera. I like it better than a Canon or Nikon. The quality of photos is amazing! The options are wonderful. I love the fact that the lens is built in and you don't miss those "quick" shots by having to "change" out lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am lazy! Yep, I admit it. I do not want to lug equipment around with lens and other camera equipment. So, I was in search of something that would give me the closest thing to a professional camera, without the extra baggage and VOILA! Here it is! I get four shots in one! It is awesome! Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: could seriously replace your SLR.
customer_reviews.text: Fast lens, great zoom, quick and accurate focusing. In fact, it's almost as fast as my nikon Slr. Photowise, it is very difficult to fault. I have not done any pixel peeping, so cannot comment on how fine the grains are. If you are looking for a Slr capable camera with a monster zoom, there is only one out there. The manual zoom not only makes zooming faster and more accurate, it also allows you to take some of those artistic shots of light while zooming in or out, which only manual zooms can.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Must read the instructions completely through as I did, and then with a little practice, it all makes sense. Takes very good pictures in my opinion and the automatic EXR setting seems to perform exceptionally well. I am very pleased with the purchase and glad my hunt for an affordable, excellent camera is over.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: ... week photo safari in Tanzania and this camera was perfect. I was able to get crystal clear photos ...
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from a 2 week photo safari in Tanzania and this camera was perfect. I was able to get crystal clear photos of animals and they are all moving, and the light varied throughout the day. The photos were so good several people on the trip liked them better than their SLR Cannon with interchangeable lenses. The quickness of the shudder, and the telephoto to 1000 mm was perfect for this trip. Not changing lenses also kept the lenses clean in all of the dust. Awesome camera.
customer_reviews.author: elena james

customer_reviews.title: Might be OK if you deal in RAW. I wouldn't know.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality unacceptable. Very noisy and soft edges. I am using the in-camera JPG compression but that's because I don't have the time, patience, or hard drive space to mess around with RAW files.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lutz

customer_reviews.title: A great camera for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fun and easy to use. It is very user friendly, even for a beginner. The photos are crisp and colorful too. It is everything any amateur photographer would want.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Wanamaker

customer_reviews.title: As great as the reviews had said
customer_reviews.text: There are a few of the top rated super zooms and it's confusing as to which to choose. When you get it down to the top few, go and touch/feel the camera. This just felt right in my hand and has not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ELG

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this camera. Reached in 4 days with free shipping. best camera i have ever owned. If you want a DSLR, then buy a DSLR... if you want a great point and shoot this is it
customer_reviews.author: izzy4145

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this camera. I've had previous Fuji HS cameras, and this is the best by far. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I haven't had a chance to use all the features yet. It does a very good job up to 400 ISO, and I've even gotten a few keepers at 800 ISO. The range of the lens is great - I got a keeper of a red-tail hawk the first time I took it out. For anyone looking for a long-zoom camera, I'd recommend the Fuji HS50.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Diller

customer_reviews.title: I love it was so excited to see it
customer_reviews.text: I love it was so excited to see it! Had to return my s9400w because it broke. I had given my HS10 to my grand daughter and I love that one with the manual lens. This one also has a manual lens, which is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: SHADONI

customer_reviews.title: A very high quality, versatile camera and lens, ...
customer_reviews.text: A very high quality, versatile camera and lens, that obtains results comparable to cameras costing multiples of it. At the reduced price point since its introduction, you really can't go wrong with this little gem.
customer_reviews.author: JJL2U

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Fun.
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is getting back into photography I've found the Fujifilm FinePix HS50EXR to be amazingly versatile while being a camera that is not difficult to learn and become comfortable with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic "bridge" camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a photographer by any means but this camera makes me look like one! It's easy to use and the 42x zoom gets shots that I'd never been able to get with my point and click cameras. I haven't had any complaints about it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Pastrick

customer_reviews.title: I love Fujifilm
customer_reviews.text: U can call me crazy as I already own the HS 30, But I rushed to buy this camera cause of its awesome features, slow motion video, & of coarse the zoom, i gave my DSLR to my wife to buy this one, no need to change lenses or buy costy ones
customer_reviews.author: Khaled A. Salama

customer_reviews.title: Great bridge camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great bridge camera. It does everything my K-30 does plus a little more. I can't wait to take it out and do some wild life photography. It has a wonderful zoom and takes beautiful photos. I can see that this may become my primary camera and my Pentax my back up. The only negative would be the fact that it doesn't come with a complete owners Manuel. You came get one on line but it is 140 pages of printing. That sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Frank P.

customer_reviews.title: Very sad.
customer_reviews.text: The colors in the image were all off and I had to return it. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dressel

customer_reviews.title: BEST CAMERA FOR THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: The camera fits all my needs of CLEAR pictures; CLEAR movies; and the MANUAL TELEPHOTO ZOOM LENS is just PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Kakr

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price!! Takes amazing shots, great zoom. My wife was able to capture great looking photos even going 70 mph in the car!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Why Fuji ever discontinued this camera is a mystery. It is a winner!!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Excellently awesome. Very happy and amazed. Unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: Albert  Abrantes

customer_reviews.title: its good camera have more options in videos and photo
customer_reviews.text: i test it in Photo and videos, its good camera have more options in videos and photo.
customer_reviews.author: Hani

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was between a DSR or a point and shoot camera. I like Fujifilm cameras for a long time but I thought I was due for an upgrade. I decided to buy this camera because of the zoom, however we were in shock how beautiful and the details from the photos. I bought for the family trip to Europe and the part I enjoy the most was that when people had to stop to change lenses I took multiple pictures and they lost the moment.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE E. MELENDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic camera. I own various Nikon and Canon SLR digicams, and this FujiFilm bridge camera is as good as some of the basic ones from Nikon and Camera, especially without the need to change lenses (hence no issue of dirty sensor and pentamirror screen. The seller is also very prompt and fast in the delivery. Overall very good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm FinePix HS50EXR 16MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch LCD (Black)
customer_reviews.text: Just love the camera. There's a small learning curve just so many cool features Its a little heavier than my old camera Truly a professional camera. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Best and most reasonable all-round camera for professional photographers
customer_reviews.text: Old school professional photographers will find this camera will do virtually everything they need and are used to with some practice without dropping thousands.
customer_reviews.author: bulldog3945

customer_reviews.title: Great all around camera.
customer_reviews.text: If you can only afford one camera I definitely recommend this camera. It allows me to be very creative in all types of shooting situations. I can set in an automatic mode and my wife feels very comfortable with it and gets some great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce M

customer_reviews.title: Ths is a good camera for everyday use and travel purposes.  I have a Nikon but it's too heavy to keep around my neck 24-7.
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking for a camera to travel with. Some places have a problem with gypsies etc so I want to keep it around my neck at all times. Yes it's light enough to do that and it offers so much for its size including manual zoom which I love. All in all it is a really good value and excellent image quality in its category.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Salzman

customer_reviews.title: exxxxelent
customer_reviews.text: The Camera does everything i expected,especially the manual focus ring,(a little bit on the too smooth side),but it's OK.So was the Price.
customer_reviews.author: Rainer Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazingly intuitative. It makes learning what it can do very easy. I hate big books of instructions to pack around. It replaces a larger Canon I bought a couple years ago, but could not afford the lenses to make it do what I want. This one meets all those needs and is much less bulky. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: bmd lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use in auto mode, yet fully functional with manual settings. Zoom is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just finished lugging this camera for 10 days in Italy ...
customer_reviews.text: Just finished lugging this camera for 10 days in Italy. I was thinking it was too large and heavy, but the photos and HD videos were fabulous. This is my go-to camera from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Fuji Tops The Bill!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful Camera! All in one. I'm so used to the weight of my big DSLR, This is light and compact and I think I'll use it more!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Grimshaw

customer_reviews.title: No extras needed with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I moved from a system camera with five lens to this very nice camera that is so aptly equipped. Very well designed, very high quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Positively perfect. Exactly what I was hoping it would be when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Layne Newman

customer_reviews.title: Never buy Fuji again
customer_reviews.text: On/off button stopped working, can no longer start camera. Was an intermittent problem. Now won't work at all. Fuji wanted $160+ just for labor. This was my second and LAST Fujifilm camera.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man

customer_reviews.title: Big and Bad
customer_reviews.text: I am a big guy and this is a big camera. It looks awesome. The Auto Mode is simple and so far great shots. Plus it has all kinds of manual settings. Snaps photos fast. Also very god looking video so far. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Good condition, nicely working
customer_reviews.text: Good condition, Working nicely. Not that much scraches as an acceptable rate. :) seller took care of package very much. Thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome camera and takes pictures that look like professional photos. It is a great camera, easy to use, and the zoom can really bring you close up......buy this camera
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Greer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is loaded with technology and special features. There is a slight learning curve to become aware of it's many features. I seldom have to use a flash, as it is excellent in low light conditions. The 24 to 1000mm (42X) telephoto lens is really good, and the anti shake feature, allows you to take great shots. The movies are HD with vibrant colors. I really can't find any drawbacks to this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Earle F. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great Pro Camera Without The Expense
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased as a gift for a discerning semi pro photographer. She is very pleased and usually grabs the Fujifilm instead of her Cannon. She says it does everything she could ask for in performance, no need to carry different lenses, good battery life. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: J E P

customer_reviews.title: Love fujifilm fine pix HS50 EXR
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a camera that would come close to my Nikon 7100 but not be as heavy. I plan to take it when I travel . It has proved to be everything that I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: G. Fine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for someone who wants something better than a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera for someone who wants something better than a point and shoot but isn't ready to commit to an expensive DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Barczak

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes amazing shots. Love the manual zoom, allows me better control. EXR function provides nearly perfect scene choice automatically.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: A good camera for newbies
customer_reviews.text: A really good camera for point and shoot. Has an amazing zoom, shoots quickly, has some special filters and stuff
customer_reviews.author: Boyan Kushlev

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: and takes great video. Some of the controls could be better located but overall a very good camera. good value for the money spent
customer_reviews.author: Hank the Tank

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT CAMERA for students and amateur photographers
customer_reviews.text: incredibly fast processing speeds, dynamic apature ranges, and even novelty settings like the "toy camera" emulator! the manual settings are fast and easy (unlike the HS20 i started out with). THIS CAMERA IS AWESOME! PROS: fantastic manual features pin sharp images manual focus has been greatly improved Cons: proprietary battery gives me an insecure feeling since i can't just swap out AA's like prior models. max exposure time is 30 seconds, not quite enough for night time/dark situation photography previous model remotes do not work on this one...
customer_reviews.author: buying_for_the_win

customer_reviews.title: My best camera ever.
customer_reviews.text: I came from an other Fuji that I had damaged. Sorry I lost the last one but this one surpasses it. And thee zoom is especially great. You need to steady it but a mono pod is enough.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Muizelaar

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I have had!
customer_reviews.text: Takes sharp clear pictures! Easy to use. I have not found any faults with my purchase . I'm so excited I went with this camera
customer_reviews.author: sandyt60

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: The zoom is fantastic and the image comes out sharp. I took over four hundred images the first day I tried it out and have some "Money Shots". Great bird pictures you can really get in close.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Springer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: Living in Japan has its drawbacks when it comes to mail, so I did not receive the camera in the specified 10-14 days. Almost 2-weeks later when the camera arrive everything worked perfectly right out of the box. I have put the camera through its paces from stage performance with my grand-children in poor light, to track-and-field meets on the sunniest-of-days. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryu Jin

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: This was the second fujifilm camera that I have purchased and I am extremely happy with my choice. This camera takes amazing pictures and is extremely easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: happydad

customer_reviews.title: The Fujifilm FinePix HS50EXR is a fine "Bridge" camera with lots of  DSLR features at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I think I'm going to raise my rating to 5 stars as soon as I finish learning the rest of the features. Everything worked as advertised, although I found zooming while filming was slightly jerky; not a great deal, but a little. Battery life was and is great. New England leaf-peeking was easy and turned out great. George Clouette
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Fujifilm camera. This camera is the best out of all. The only thing is I wish it would focus quicker. I've notices some pictures are blurry because I was in a hurry to catch the moment and it came out a littled blurred. Other than that I would recommend this camera to anyone. It is very easy to use & I like the fact that you can zoom manually.
customer_reviews.author: P. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: i received the camera as its descriped, and thanks ...
customer_reviews.text: i received the camera as its descriped , and thanks for that. It is the camera that i have had dreamt before :)
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Soft images
customer_reviews.text: Much softer focus in all modes than our Lumix FZ70 regardless of sharpness setting.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: verry happy with this camera features
customer_reviews.text: Verry happy with this product, the only one thing annoying me is stiff twist lens barrel. O read some review and knowing this is the way it is!!! I Prefer auto zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Trung

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: One of Fuji's best high end fixed lens consumer cameras. Was received quickly. The image stabilization in the lens works great.
customer_reviews.author: kwc

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY ABOUT THIS PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. It takes quality pictures. Purchased for my son for his birthday. Feel like I made the right choice
customer_reviews.author: a2z

customer_reviews.title: The next generation in digital photography
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is an incredible camera for the money. Product arrived quickly and well packaged. The included print manual is pretty sparse so download the full manual to understand everything this camera is capable of doing.
customer_reviews.author: Froglips

customer_reviews.title: Another great Fuji!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this camera for a few weeks but love it!! It takes amazing photos. Fuji is the only kind of camera I ever purchase and I am always pleased with them. Portraits with these cameras usually require little processing as they capture skin tones so beautifully! The zoom on this camera is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is easy to use and the picture clarity is excellent. Shot a definable picture at 2000 ft - nice.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jeffers

product_meta.title: Fujifilm FinePix HS50EXR 16MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch LCD (Black) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description: The New FinePix HS50EXR features a 1/2" 16M EXR CMOS II for High Image Quality images, Fast autofocus and Quick Response. New Intelligent Hybrid AF auto focuses in as fast as 0.05 sec. thanks EXR CMOS II. Depending on the scene, Hybrid AF instantly switches between high-speed phase detection AF(found in most top-end SLRs), and contrast AF, which is employed when high contrast light is present. Applying the fastest algorithm according to the targeted subject and scene, Hybrid AF guarantees your subject will be in focus as quickly as possible ensuring your shots are captured perfectly. The newly developed Fujinon optical 42x manual zoom lens (24 - 1,000mm) effectively combines a spherical lenses, ED lens, and integrated lenses to achieve a bright aperture rating of f/2.8 - 5.6, and image stabilization. Super Macro mode allows close-up shooting from as near as 1cm and the manual barrel zoom ensures speedy, intuitive control of the camera. Lens shift image stabilization ensures that even hand-held shots are free from blur. And if you are trying to take tricky, close to the ground, macro flower shots or want to capture the band on the main stage above the heads of the crowd, you can switch to the very useful 3.0-inch Vari-Angle LCD screen. Again boasting a detailed 920K-dot, the LCD screen can fold out and flip around so you can see what you are taking - no matter what the angle you're trying to shoot at. The FinePix HS50EXR boasts a high-resolution (920K-dot) electronic viewfinder equipped with an eye sensor, making it easier to frame subjects and check focus in bright daylight conditions. The bright EVF accommodates a traditional shooting style, making it easy to steady the camera, even when shooting with the 42x zoom fully extended. Full HD Movie 1080p/60fps with continuous phase detection AF Phase detection autofocus is active during movie recording for faster focus response.
feature_bullets: Tilting 3.0-inch TFT color LCD monitor and electronic viewfinder with eye sensor
16 million effective pixels 1/2-inch EXR CMOS processor with primary color filter and lens shift image stabilization.
Fujinon 42x optical zoom lens with approx. 2.0x digital zoom (up to approx. 84x with 42x optical zoom)
Focal Length: f/4.4mm-185mm; Full Aperture: f/2.8-f/11 (Wide), f/5.6-f/11 (Telephoto)
Full HD Movie (1920x1080p/60fps) with stereo sound

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars324 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
